q: I'm having technical issues on the site.
a: If you're experiencing any technical difficulties, please email us at support@dinosaur.directory. We will help you get back to exploring our world of dinos!

q: Do you collect any of my data?
a: We respect your privacy. We only use minimal, anonymous data to enhance your experienceâ€”no sign-ups, no tracking, just dino-magic.
Accuracy matters to us! If you spot any errors, please email us at support@dinosaur.directory so we can promptly make the necessary updates.

q: How can I request my favourite dino?
a: We love hearing your dino suggestions! Just drop us an email at support@dinosaur.directory with your favourite dino, and we'll do our best to include it.
